title: The Reluctant Dragon & Mr. Toad Show
overview: The Reluctant Dragon and Mr. Toad was a half-hour animated series loosely based on Kenneth Grahame's popular 1907 children's book, The Wind in the Willows. The short-lived show was split into two segments, the first of which featured Tobias, the Reluctant Dragon. The second segment centered around Mr. Toad.
